io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.annotations

Annotation Type ResourceLink


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface ResourceLink
    Used to define methods that allow clients to access only the Link or URI that is pointing to a resource (without actually fetching it). The return type of the method must be a Link or String.

    If your interface extends from LinkableResource then you won't need to add this annotation yourself, as LinkableResource.createLink() is already annotated.
